16-02-1933.title: the call
16-02-1933.monologue: Something excepcional just happened, I can't believe it

20-02-1933.title: the punishement
20-02-1933.monologue: Jhon was beaten for some gangster two days ago...

27-02-1933.title: the agent
27-02-1933.monologue: we release that information about tony, now a man is standing out of the building, he said that we want to talk with us about this mafia thing we are publishing. He said is an agent of the BOI.

06-03-1933.title: I appreciate your silence
06-03-1933.monologue: she said, we appreciate your silence darling.

end01.title: The last hero
end01.conclusion:
One week later I given noticed about the dead of Jhonathan.
I knew it, and I tried to convice him about that mistake.
Now he is dead... this city... this country only goes down, we are dammned.

end00.title: Bankruptcy
end00.conclusion: I'm too old for this job, Frank was right the newspaper can't continue...
